ED_Title: Venue of the fifteenth session of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development, in 2020
ED_DecisionText: At its 52nd plenary meeting, on 19 December 2019, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Second Committee,  recognizing the offer of the Government of Barbados to host the fifteenth session of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development and the offer of the Government of the United Arab Emirates to host the World Investment Forum and an electronic commerce week for Asia, took note of the report of the Trade and Development Board on its sixty-sixth session,   which had been held in Geneva from 24 to 27 June 2019, and the decision contained therein, and welcomed the generous offer of the Government of Barbados to host the fifteenth session of the Conference.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/74/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
